long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize YouTube Videos with ChatGPT. Get the most important information, instantly.

## Key Features:

• Instant Summaries: Get concise TLDR summaries of YouTube videos in seconds.
• Multi-Language Support: Enjoy summaries and translations in 40+ languages.
• User-Friendly Features: Includes markdown rendering, dark mode for eye comfort, and a sleek design for your summaries
• Time-Stamped Navigation: Easily jump to specific parts of videos or documents.

## Perfect for:

• Students and researchers
• Business professionals
• News enthusiasts
• Lifelong learners
• Anyone looking to save time and boost productivity

## Technical Highlights:

• Fast processing: Average summary time of a few seconds
• Handles long-form content: Summarize videos up to 10 hours long
• Powered by OpenAI's ChatGPT API for reliable and high-quality results using only the best models

## How It Works:

• Install the extension
• Click the extension icon to login or create a free account with monthly credits
• Navigate to any YouTube video
• Click the new "Summarize" button that you can find next to the YouTube like buttons
• Enjoy your summary

Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. We only use secure servers hosted in Germany. Your data is encrypted and secure at all times.

## Why Choose Our YouTube Summary Extension?

Our YouTube summary extension helps you quickly understand long videos in just seconds. It works great for all kinds of content - from business talks and news reports to educational videos. The AI summarizer gives you the main points and key takeaways, saving you time and effort. With support for over 40 languages, you can access information from videos worldwide. The extension also provides timestamped summaries, making it easy to find specific parts of a video. You can summarize videos up to 10 hours long, and it only takes a few seconds to process. Plus, your data stays safe with our secure servers in Germany. Whether you're a student, professional, or just curious, our tool helps you learn faster and be more productive. Powered by ChatGPT, it delivers accurate summaries you can trust. Try our YouTube Summary Extension today and start getting more from your video watching time.

Note: This is an independently developed extension and is not officially associated with OpenAI or YouTube.
